import '../App.css'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; function myappointment() { const [data, setData] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { fetch("http://localhost:5000/api/appointments/my", { headers: { Authorization: localStorage.getItem("token") }, }) .then(res => res.json()) .then(data => setData(data)); }, []); return (

My Appointments

Dr. Michael Lee 25 Sep 2025 4:30 PM Cancelled
); } export default myappointment;
